title: Can't load into game.
body: Hi recently I was trying to play but every time I load into the game, the icons all indicate 0% on the loading screen, and it does not change. I've tried everything on the Hextech repair and disabling anti-virus but nothing happens. Does anyone have a solution?

replies.body: Hey, not seeing any issues right now but I'd like to try some adjustments to see if it helps.  You may need to [configure your DNS ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)in case your connection is having issues routing to the game server.  In that same guide, check out port forwarding to make sure the path is clear.  Test it in a custom game and let me know if it helps.
Im dealing with this same problem!
I also have had this problem where every player is at 0% and nothing happens, once yesterday and now it's happening again.
